results.description: Marcela discovered an ependymoma in her spinal cord. Living internationally, she shares how she found support online and chose to participate in a study to help others.
results.title: Connecting with Others with a Rare Cancer Diagnosis - National Cancer Institute

results.description: Lee was shocked to learn he had a tumor in his spinal cord that required surgery. He shares how he found the right neurosurgeon, prepared and recovered fully from surgery, and now wants to help others.
results.title: Spinal Cord Tumor Survivor Shares Tips to Prepare and Recover from Surgery - National Cancer Institute
